epd_metadata.product_group_classification: UN CPC 375 (Articles of concrete, cement and plaster)

lca_information.scope: cradle to gate (modules A1-A3) with options, modules A4-A5, modules C1-C4 and module D
lca_information.databases_and_software: SimaPro® LCA software (v 9.5), AusLCI v1.42 (2023), Ecoinvent 3.9.1 (2023)
lca_information.allocation: Physical and economic allocation based on weight and cost
lca_information.cut_off_criteria: No energy or mass flows, except packaging of materials were excluded

end_of_life.waste_processing: 80% recycled, 25 km delivery distance to landfill/reprocessing

carbon_emission_context.global_co2_emissions: 39% from building environment, 11% from construction materials

recycled_materials_handling.fly_ash: Treated as waste material, only transport impacts included
recycled_materials_handling.silica_fume: Treated as waste material, only transport impacts included

contact.address: Level 40, Northpoint Tower, 100 Miller St, North Sydney NSW 2060, Australia
